name: Exo TD
description: Exo TD is a true 3D space Tower Defense. Invaders have scouted your planet as their next target, you must protect it by building destructive turrets, orbital defenses, shields, drones and more to defend against the incoming invasion force.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: TBD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: TBD Storage: 2 GB available space
